page.title: 02Farms.N.Runcton & Middleton.
page.content: We spoke to two farmers, one in North Runcton and one in Middleton. One farms about 200 acres and the other about 3000 acres(divided between three farms). Despite the differences in size the pattern of farming is very similar in each case. { Arable}farming is the main activity and the chief crops are{wheat}and {barley}then sugar beet. Oil-seed rape, oats, and potatoes are also grown. We asked what changes have taken place in the last l5 years and were told of the rapid growth in importance of{oil-seed {rape}which is now a more profitable crop than either wheat or barley. Both farmers keep beef cattle which they sell at{Kings Lynn}market.Only one breeds his own cattle.The large farm also has sheep and pigs.
